NPC ID1313

The bartender at the Rusty Anchor Inn in Port Sarim is a non-player character who serves beer to players for two coins.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Stock
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • The bartender is the solution to the easy cryptic clue: Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Anchor in Port Sarim.
